rows.label: qev086902_MSG0001
rows.name: Rock![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0002
rows.name:
Those beams would have crushed me
if Rock hadn't stepped in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0003
rows.name: Oww...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0004
rows.name: Are you hurt?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0005
rows.name: I'm gonna have a huge lump on my head...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0006
rows.name: Just lump? Rock's head made of rock too?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0007
rows.name: Oh, thank goodness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0008
rows.name: This is gonna put the whole project on hold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0009
rows.name: Beams are shot, boss. They're all bent to hell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0010
rows.name: I figured as much. Well, that's the day. Go on home, boys.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0011
rows.name: And don't bother coming in tomorrow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0012
rows.name: Huh? When should we come back?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0013
rows.name: Beams gotta be recast. That means waiting for fresh ore.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0014
rows.name: You go see the doc on your way home, Rock. Got it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0015
rows.name: Yes, sir.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0016
rows.name: Um, I'm really sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0017
rows.name: For what? Not your fault at all, big guy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0018
rows.name: Need help finding a doctor?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0019
rows.name: Oh, I don't need one. It's really just a bump.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0020
rows.name: The foreman's just being nice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0021
rows.name: It's nice of him to look out for his team like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0022
rows.name: Yeah. I'm just sad there's nothing I can do for him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev086902_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask what the problem is.

rows.label: qev086902_JNK0020
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: qev086902_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Rock there's no reason he can't help.

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0023
rows.name:
The beams are hardened with a special ore
known as aerozium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0023_2
rows.name: But sadly, their aerozium supply has run dry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0024
rows.name: Aerozium is a pretty rare mineral, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0025
rows.name:
Until they acquire new ore,
it seems the construction project will not be able to proceed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0026
rows.name: Rats. And I finally found a job I liked, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0027
rows.name: Fear not, Rock. I'll find a way to fix this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0028
rows.name: ...Hey, I guess you're right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0029
rows.name: Maybe I CAN do something to get us up and running again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0030
rows.name: Why was the project put on hold?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0031
rows.name:
The beams are hardened with a special ore
known as aerozium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0031_2
rows.name: But sadly, their aerozium supply has run dry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0032
rows.name: Aerozium is a pretty rare mineral, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0033
rows.name:
Until they acquire new ore,
it seems the construction project will not be able to proceed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0034
rows.name: This sound like job for Nopon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0035
rows.name: Nopon are masters of trade.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0036
rows.name:
Some Nopon somewhere know where to find aerozium.
Tatsu guarantee it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0037
rows.name: That's actually an excellent idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0038
rows.name: Thank you, Tatsu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0039
rows.name: Wow, you're actually useful sometimes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0040
rows.name: Linly finally noticed?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0041
rows.name:
All right, let's start asking around.
Celica, if you'd join us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086902_MSG0042
rows.name: Of course.[ST:wait ]
